item.description:
I would like to use this week as a chance to explore a new park. I'll add the time and location as I receive some feedback.

What is a park you have heard about, but not explored?


1/10/10 - We have a location: Knapp Town Forest (Duxbury Forest). Details to follow....

1/11/10 - We will meet at one of the 2 small parking lots on Mayflower Street. We should try to park at the longer lot. I will have a green Chevy pickup. Kate, one of our members, will be in a blue Jeep Cherokee. If you have any trouble please feel free to call my cell 508-510-1136

Please plan for 2 hours in the woods. Any questions feel free to email me.
item.name: Sunday Hiking
